about_the_game:
As the riot in Paris came to the end, people wants to know the truth behind that series of things. Our brave journalist Miss Elisa decides to take a risk to solve the mysteries around Pauline Bonaparte.

This DLC contains 5 new stages with high difficulty, and you can find them at salon after you clear all Main Quests.
detailed_description:
As the riot in Paris came to the end, people wants to know the truth behind that series of things. Our brave journalist Miss Elisa decides to take a risk to solve the mysteries around Pauline Bonaparte.

This DLC contains 5 new stages with high difficulty, and you can find them at salon after you clear all Main Quests.
legal_notice: Developed by Azure Flame Studio. Published by 2P Games. 2P Games, Banner of the Maid and the 2P Games and Banner of the Maid logos are trademarks and/or registered trademarks. All rights reserved.
name: Banner of the Maid - Miss Elisa's Journal

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Support 1280 x 720 or higher resolution, 512MB or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Support 1280 x 720 or higher resolution, 512MB or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Banner of the Maid is a turn-base strategy game set in the time of the French Revolution. You will lead the army to break through the difficulties and experience the different stories of that most uncommon time with wine of salon and the smoke of battlefield.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese, English
*languages with full audio support
